data.text:

Wedding of playwright Harold Pinter and author Lady Antonia Fraser at Kensington Registry

Wedding of playwright Harold Pinter and author Lady Antonia Fraser at Kensington Registry Office.

27th November 1980.

Lord Longford. Â© Mirrorpix

Ron Burton

London

England

Media ID 21608466

Arts Author Bride Ceremony Couples Groom Man And Woman Marriage Mid Adult Couple Nobility Nobles Peer Peerage Playwright Writer

Framed Prints

Step into the world of literary history with our exquisite framed print from Media Storehouse's Memory Lane Prints collection. This captivating image captures the magical moment when playwright Harold Pinter and author Lady Antonia Fraser exchanged vows at the Kensington Registry Office on November 27, 1980. Witness the love and elegance of this iconic wedding, expertly captured by renowned photographer Ron Burton. Add a touch of timeless charm to your home or office with this beautiful framed print, a stunning addition to any room and a conversation starter for years to come.

Photo Prints

Step back in time with this exquisite photographic print from the Media Storehouse collection, featuring the memorable wedding day of renowned playwright Harold Pinter and esteemed author Lady Antonia Fraser. Captured by the skilled lens of Ron Burton, this image from Memory Lane Prints beautifully documents their nuptials at the Kensington Registry Office on November 27, 1980. With Lord Longford in attendance, this historic moment is immortalized in this high-quality, museum-grade print. Add a touch of timeless elegance to your home or office decor with this unique and captivating piece of history.

Poster Prints

Step back in time and relive the magical moment of the iconic wedding of playwright Harold Pinter and author Lady Antonia Fraser at Kensington Registry Office in 1980. Captured beautifully by renowned photographer Ron Burton of Memory Lane Prints, this exquisite poster print transports you to the scene of their nuptials, surrounded by the elegance and sophistication of the occasion. A must-have for any fan of literature or theatre, this unique and captivating print is sure to make a striking addition to your home or office decor. Order yours today and bring a piece of history into your space.

Jigsaw Puzzles

Bring history to life with the Media Storehouse Jigsaw Puzzle featuring the iconic image of Harold Pinter and Lady Antonia Fraser's wedding day. This beautiful puzzle, part of our Memory Lane Prints collection, showcases Ron Burton's captivating photograph of the ceremony held at Kensington Registry Office on November 27, 1980. Immerse yourself in the rich storytelling of this timeless moment as you piece together the intricate details of this historic event, making it a perfect addition to any puzzle collection or as a thoughtful gift for history or Pinter fans.
